java.vendor=Sun Microsystems Inc.
BootLoader constants: OS=win32, ARCH=x86, WS=win32, NL=en_NZ
Command-line arguments:  -os win32 -ws win32 -arch x86

------------------------------------------------------------------------

This happened when I had an unsaved file open and I closed the entire workset (
all projects in it )

After the error the IDE tells me the unsaved file has been deleted and gives me
an option to save the content of the buffer to a new file.  But when you try to
select a new file ... it says all the projects are closed ... and goes back in
circles till I cancel the save operation.

Although it said the file was deleted fortunately the file was still there on
the file system.

Cheers
*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 112926 ***
